desc: MEDfacials, led by Dr Joachim Stolte, is an Aesthetic Clinic based in the heart of Truro. Dr Stolte offers tailor made and targeted aesthetic solutions for your skin and hair. We offer Lip Fillers, Profhilo, Facials, Peels, Tixel which help with sagging and ageing skin. Book your free Consultation here.

layout.text: Truro's Trusted Aesthetic Skin and Haircare Clinic.
Fit to Fly Certification via our Rapid Health Test Homepage
